Package de.oth.blocklib.shaders

Class ShaderProgram

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.shaders.ShaderProgram
All Implemented Interfaces:
Shader, java.lang.Comparable<Shader>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseShader, DebugGridShader, DeferredLightShader, GBufferShader, GUIShader, HeightMapShader, LineShader, OverlayShader, ShaderDemo.DemoShader, ShadowShader
public abstract class ShaderProgram
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shader
Abstract base class for all shader programs, used to render objects. A shader program is defined by a vertex and a fragment shader file, located in /res/assets/shaders. ShaderPrograms are called by the MasterRender, sorted by their priority.
Author:
edit: Tobias Werner WiSe17/18
See Also:
MasterRenderer, Material

    • ShaderProgram

      protected ShaderProgram​(java.lang.String vertexFile, java.lang.String fragmentFile)
      Loads a shader from the location of the parameters and binds it as glProgram.
      Parameters:
      vertexFile - where to find the file with the vertex shader.
      fragmentFile - where to find the file with the fragment shader.

  • Method Details

    • loadShader

      public static int loadShader​(java.lang.String file, int type)
      Loads shader from a location and compiles it with glCompileShader.
      Parameters:
      file - location of shader
      type - shader type: GL20.GL_VERTEX_SHADER or GL20.GL_FRAGMENT_SHADER

    • bindTexture

      protected int bindTexture​(java.lang.String samplerName)
      Binds a sampler uniform to a texture unit.
      Parameters:
      samplerName - Name of the sampler variable in the shader
      Returns:
      texture unit the sampler was bound to, starting at GL13.GL_TEXTURE0

    • getPriority

      public int getPriority()
      Priority of this shader, determines render order. Lower values = higher priority
      Specified by:
      getPriority in interface Shader
      Returns:
      priority of this shader. Defaults toOPAQUE.
